title: Angela from ‘Paradise’ and Co-Host Krystal Nielson
description:
Ali is joined by guest co-host and newlywed Krystal Nielson while Rachel is on her honeymoon! Plus, straight from “Paradise,” Angela Amezcua talks about her past with Clay and her experience this season on “Bachelor in Paradise.”

Be sure to rate and subscribe so you never miss an episode.
